tasks.label: 1. upgrade_agent_build_deploy
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/cmd/upgrade_agent/ && rm -rf ./upgrade_agent && rm -rf ${workspaceFolder}/deployments/upgrade_agent/upgrade_agent && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build && cp ./upgrade_agent ${workspaceFolder}/deployments/upgrade_agent/

tasks.label: 2. upgrade_agent_create_image
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/deployments/upgrade_agent/ && docker image remove -f patrao_upgrade_agent && docker build --tag=patrao_upgrade_agent .

tasks.label: 3. upgrade_agent_run_image
tasks.command: docker container prune -f && docker run --expose 1080/tcp -v /Users/dgritsay/Documents/Projects/Nutanix/test:/host/test -v /usr/local/bin:/usr/local/bin:ro -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro --name patrao_agent patrao_upgrade_agent
